net.grian.spatium.api

Interface Vector

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, Collideable, java.io.Serializable, SpatiumObject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PolarVector3f, Vector3f

    public interface Vector
extends Collideable
    A three-dimensional vector. Can be either karthesian or polar depending on the implementation.
